snippet: Suntech Power, a U.S.-listed company that is closing its Arizona plant, is poised to be taken over by the government of its hometown in China.
abstract: Solar panel maker Suntech Power, United States-listed company that is closing its Arizona plant, is poised to be taken over by the government of its hometown in China; firm owes hundreds of millions of dollars to bondholders and is on financial brink.
lead_paragraph: Suntech Power, a U.S.-listed company that is closing its Arizona plant, is poised to be taken over by the government of its hometown in China.

headline.seo: Suntech Power on Verge of Takeover by Chinese Holding Company
headline.main: Suntech, Owing Millions, Faces a Takeover
headline.print_headline: Suntech, Owing Millions, Is Near Takeover by Chinese Holding Company
